title: Gold V player takes a champ they've used once to Ranked
body:
Safe in the knowledge that they'll get the end of season rewards while making the game miserable for everyone else.

Thanks for allowing this Riot.

Will not be playing this game after this season.

replies.body: you can't assume someone is trolling just because they 'first time' a champion in ranked. The first time I played Morg in ranked, I had just come back from playing her in EUW during holiday, and went on a winning streak. Technically, I first timed Morg for my OCE account, and it went splendidly, on the other hand, I have near 300k mastery on shaco, if you see me playing shaco in ranked, there is a 60% chance we will lose this game. Which would you prefer?
